name: Battle of the Rexs
description:
Created for Solent Megajam in 4 days

Build your own custom robot and fight enemies to gain gold. Use this gold to build an even better robot. Repeat this until you have the most awesome robot ever built.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys ----- Move

Mouse ------------------------Aim

Left click ---------------------Shoot / Select

Credits:

Game design and Programming:  Mitchell Dixon

Menu Design:                                          Emily Lane

Music:                                                          Playonloop.com
